languages.text: "Мне доложили, что вы решили произвести допрос одного из подозреваемых, Лорд-капитан. Считаю своим долгом присутствовать при этой процедуре для обеспечения вашей безопасности".
languages.translation_comment: через зтм приводим Зауэрбек — она хочет понаблюдать за допросом
через зтм приводим Зауэрбек — она хочет понаблюдать за допросом

languages.text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."
languages.original_text: "Мне доложили, что вы решили произвести допрос одного из подозреваемых, Лорд-капитан. Считаю своим долгом присутствовать при этой процедуре для обеспечения вашей безопасности".

traits.locale_text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation in order to ensure your safety."
"I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation in order to ensure your safety."

"I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."

languages.text: « On m'informe que vous avez l'intention de questionner l'un des suspects, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Or, je considère qu'il est de mon devoir d'assister à l'interrogatoire afin d'assurer votre sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: « On m'informe que vous avez l'intention de questionner l'un des suspects, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Or, je considère qu'il est de mon devoir d'assister à l'interrogatoire afin d'assurer votre sécurité. »

languages.text: «Me han informado de su decisión de interrogar a uno de los sospechosos, Lord Capitán. Es mi deber estar presente durante el interrogatorio para garantizar su seguridad».
languages.original_text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: «Me han informado de su decisión de interrogar a uno de los sospechosos, Lord Capitán. Es mi deber estar presente durante el interrogatorio para garantizar su seguridad».

languages.text: “我听说，您打算亲自审讯其中一位嫌疑犯，舰长大人。我认为我有必要出席这场审讯，这样才能确保您的人身安全。”
languages.original_text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: “我听说，您打算亲自审讯其中一位嫌疑犯，舰长大人。我认为我有必要出席这场审讯，这样才能确保您的人身安全。”

languages.text: 「容疑者の一人に尋問を行うというご決断についてお聞きしました、ロード・キャプテン。陛下の安全を確保するため、尋問に立ち会うことが、我の義務だと考えます」
languages.original_text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: 「容疑者の一人に尋問を行うというご決断についてお聞きしました、ロード・キャプテン。陛下の安全を確保するため、尋問に立ち会うことが、我の義務だと考えます」

languages.text: "Ich wurde über Eure Entscheidung informiert, einen der Verdächtigen zu befragen, Lord Captain. Ich halte es für meine Pflicht, dem Verhör beizuwohnen, um Eure Sicherheit zu gewährleisten."
languages.original_text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde über Eure Entscheidung informiert, einen der Verdächtigen zu befragen, Lord Captain. Ich halte es für meine Pflicht, dem Verhör beizuwohnen, um Eure Sicherheit zu gewährleisten."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, şüphelilerden birini sorguya çekme kararınıza dair bilgi aldım. Sorguda mevcut olmayı vazifem olarak görüyorum. Böylece güvenliğinizden emin olabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I have been informed of your decision to question one of the suspects, Lord Captain. I consider it my duty to be present for the interrogation so that I may ensure your safety."
